powerful_solution.title: Powerful solution
powerful_solution.desc: The English learning resources, artificial intelligence, learning functions and after-class revision solutions provided by EHLA are currently unparalleled in the globe!

order.title: Exclusive discount for EHLA facebook parent group members
order.p1: 👉 If you subscribe for 3 months at a time, enjoy a 10% special discount
order.p2: 👉 If you subscribe for a single month, enjoy 5% special discount
order.p3: 💖 As long as you subscribe to the after-class revision packs (10 sets), you can enjoy the largely discounted subscription fee of $50 per month (retail price: HK$168 monthly).

k3_revision_pack.title: Revision Module for Kids 3yro＋
k3_revision_pack.subtitle: Boosting effect goes beyond your expectations!
k3_revision_pack.desc: The unparalleled boosting effect of the revision module goes beyond your expectations:
k3_revision_pack.note: Currently only open to subscription for one-on-one class, big class or small-group class students at a special price of HK$30 per set. Study time for each set: one month.

exam_training_pack.title: Exam-prep Revision & Tutorial Packs
exam_training_pack.subtitle: Goes beyond your expectations!
exam_training_pack.note: Supported with after-class bilingual teaching videos by senior teachers from HK day schools to ensure that the student can completely absorb and digest the knowledge points after class, if she or he cannot fully understand what the native speaker teacher has taught in Zoom class.

lesson_target_writing: Target students: Students with basic writing skills.
